column4: I have 3 files, I want to burn them to DVD from command line, how can I do it ?
I think the 'cdrecord' tool is what you're looking for, which has various frontends to try to make it more friendly.
does it work from the command line ? does it burn files to a DVD ?
cdrecord is cli, yes.  I believe it can do DVD, but you'd want to check the man page on that.
